      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15229</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Viaggiare sicuri all'estero</string>
            <string language="en">Safe travelling abroad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Safe, das auswärts reist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Coffre-fort voyageant à l'étranger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cofre que viaja no exterior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρηματοκιβώτιο που ταξιδεύει στο εξωτερικό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caja fuerte que viaja al extranjero</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un utile oggetto per tutte le ragazze e i ragazzi che vogliono conoscere i loro diritti quando viaggiano all'estero</string>
            <string language="en">A helpful object for all young girls and boys that want to know thier human rights when travelling abroad</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">passaporto valido</string>
            <string language="en">valid passport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">viaggio sicuro e protetto</string>
            <string language="en">safe and secure travelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">diritti umani</string>
            <string language="en">human rights</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine nützliche Nachricht für alle jungen 
Mädchen und Jungen, die thier menschliche Rechte kennen möchten, 
wenn sie auswärts reisen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un objet utile pour toutes les jeunes filles et 
garçons qui veulent savoir des droits de l'homme thier en voyageant 
à l'étranger</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um objeto útil para todas as meninas novas e 
meninos que queiram saber direitas humanas mais thier ao viajar no 
exterior</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα χρήσιμο αντικείμενο για όλα τα νέα κορίτσια και 
τα αγόρια που θέλουν να ξέρουν τα pjo' τχηερ ανθρώπινα 
δικαιώματα κατά να ταξιδεψουν στο εξωτερικό</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un objeto provechoso para todas las muchachas 
jóvenes y muchachos que desean saber derechos humanos ma's thier al 
viajar al extranjero</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gültiger Paß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sicheres und sicheres Reisen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschliche Rechte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">passeport valide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">déplacement sûr et bloqué</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">droits de l'homme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">passport válido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">viajar seguro e seguro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">direitas humanas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έγκυρο διαβατήριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ασφαλές και ασφαλές ταξίδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τα ανθρώπινα δικαιώματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pasaporte válido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el viajar seguro y seguro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">derechos humanos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">15-20</string>
            <string language="en">15-20</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli studenti ricevono un testo su alcuni dei loro diritti umani naturali quando viaggiano all'estero. Dopo che hanno acquisito la conoscenza necessaria, leggendo il testo, devono riempire gli spazi. Se ci sono difficoltà, gli studenti possono usare gli aiuti, ma con la consapevolezza che ogni suggerimento cancellerà il punteggio. Dopo aver finito il compito, i partecipanti possono controllare i loro risultati.</string>
            <string language="en">Students are given a text concerning some of their natural human rights when traveling abroad. After they have gained the necessary knowledge, by reading the  text, they have to fill in the gaps. If there are some difficulties, students can use the hints, but with the note that each clue takes away from their points. After finishing the task, the participants can check their results.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
